content: Unsupported action. Please switch to the desktop mode to be able to edit PDFs or create PDF forms.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when attempting to edit or create PDFs on mobile devices. It appears as an info toast notification and instructs users to switch to desktop mode to enable these actions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'iş masası rejiminə' (desktop mode) is a literal translation and might not be the most natural way to express 'desktop mode' in Azerbaijani. It feels slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more colloquial or user-friendly phrasing like 'kompüter rejiminə keçin' (switch to computer mode) or 'masaüstü rejiminə keçin' (switch to desktop mode) which is more commonly understood.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Chcete-li upravovat soubory PDF nebo vytvářet formuláře PDF, přepněte prosím do režimu počítače." is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Režimu počítače' is awkward. The word 'desktop' can be translated as 'počítač' but the phrasing is stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Chcete-li upravovat PDF soubory nebo vytvářet PDF formuláře, přepněte prosím do počítačové verze.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'κατάσταση εργασίας' (katastasi ergasias) translates to 'work state' or 'work mode', which is not the intended meaning of 'desktop mode'. A more accurate translation for 'desktop mode' would be 'επιτραπέζια λειτουργία' (epitrapezia λειτουργia).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Μεταβείτε στην επιτραπέζια λειτουργία για να μπορείτε να επεξεργαστείτε PDF ή να δημιουργήσετε φόρμες PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'MobileEditPdfNotAvailableInfo' implies a notification about PDF editing not being available on mobile. The Spanish translation, 'Acción no admitida,' is too generic and doesn't convey the specific context of PDF editing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more specific translation like: 'Edición de PDF no disponible en dispositivos móviles. Cambie al modo de escritorio para poder editar archivos PDF o crear formularios PDF.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the Spanish translation could benefit from a slightly more natural flow. The original is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider: 'La edición de PDF no está disponible en dispositivos móviles. Para poder editar archivos PDF o crear formularios PDF, cambie al modo de escritorio.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'PDF' is inconsistently capitalized. It should be consistently 'PDF'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'PDF' with 'PDF' throughout the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Veuillez passer en mode desktop' is slightly awkward.  A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Veuillez passer au mode bureau' or 'Veuillez activer le mode bureau' instead of 'Veuillez passer en mode desktop'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon after "Համակարգչային ռեժիմին" is unnecessary and creates a slight awkwardness in the sentence flow. It is more natural to omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Change "Համակարգչային ռեժիմին:“ to “Համակարգչային ռեժիմ”

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "데스크탑 모드로 전환하세요" is a bit too literal and formal for a user-facing message. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: PDF를 편집하거나 PDF 양식을 만들려면 데스크탑 버전으로 전환해주세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ຄອມພິວເຕີ້' is a transliteration of 'computer' and might not be the most natural way to say 'desktop' in Lao. While understandable, it could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ່ຽນໄປໃຊ້ໂໝດອຸປະກອນຄອມພິວເຕີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ການກະທຳແບບນີ້ຍັງບໍ່ຮອງຮັບ' is a bit literal and clunky. A more natural phrasing might be preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບໍ່ສາມາດເຮັດການນີ້ໄດ້ໃນປັດຈຸບັນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Niet-ondersteunde handeling" is a bit awkward and literal. A more natural Dutch translation for 'Unsupported action' would be 'Ongeldige actie' or 'Deze actie wordt niet ondersteund'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ongeldige actie / Deze actie wordt niet ondersteund

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Włącz tryb pulpitu" is a literal translation of "switch to the desktop mode" and isn't the most natural way to express this in Polish. A more idiomatic translation would be something like "Przejdź do trybu pulpitu" or "Użyj trybu pulpitu".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Przejdź do trybu pulpitu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Área de trabalho' translates to 'work area' which is not the intended meaning of 'desktop mode'.  'Desktop mode' should be more accurately conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Alternar para o modo desktop/versão para desktop para poder editar PDFs ou criar formulários PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Treceți la modul desktop' is a bit literal. A more natural Romanian phrasing for 'switch to desktop mode' would be 'utilizați modul desktop' or 'accesați modul desktop'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: utilizați modul desktop

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'මෙවැනි ක්‍රියාවලියකට අපි සහායෝගය කරන්නේ නෑ' (mevan'i kriyawaliyakata api sahaayogaaya karan'e nae) translates to 'We do not support such a process'. While accurate, it's less user-friendly than a more direct explanation of the limitation. The English implies lack of support for the *action*, not a general lack of support.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙවැනි ක්‍රියාවලිය කළ නොහැකියි. PDF සංස්කරණය කිරීමටත්, PDF ආකෘතීන් නිර්මාණය කිරීමටත්, පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වයට හැරවිය යුතුයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වයට හැරවිය යුතුයි' (parighanaka kriyakaarithuwathata harawiya yeththaai) literally means 'must be turned to computer functionality'. A more natural phrasing for Sinhala would be 'පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වය භාවිතා කළ යුතුයි' (parighanaka kriyakaarithuwathaa upayogathaa kala yeththaai) or 'පරිඝණක පරිසරයට යා යුතුය' (parighanaka parisarathaa yaaythu yai).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිඝණක පරිසරයට යා යුතුය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit long and complex for optimal readability. It might be beneficial to split it into two shorter sentences.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙවැනි ක්‍රියාවලිය කළ නොහැකියි. PDF න්‍යාථා සංස්කරණය කිරීමටත්, PDF ආකෘතීන් නිර්මාණය කිරීමටත්, පරිඝණක ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වයට හැරවිය යුතුයි.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of 'Please' is missing. The English sentence uses a polite imperative, and the Slovenian should reflect this to maintain the original tone. While 'Preklopite' is grammatically correct, it lacks the politeness implied by 'Please'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nepodprto dejanje. Prosim, preklopite v namizni način, da boste lahko urejali datoteke PDF ali ustvarjali obrazce PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Preklopite v namizni način' could be more naturally translated as 'preklopi v namizni način' or 'preklopite na namizni način'. The current phrasing is a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nepodprto dejanje. Prosim, preklopi v namizni način, da boste lahko urejali datoteke PDF ali ustvarjali obrazce PDF.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Неподржана акција. Молимо Вас да пребаците на десктоп режим да бисте уређивали PDF-ове или креирали PDF обрасце.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses "PDF-ove" which is a shortened form and can appear less formal. While acceptable, using the full form "PDF datoteke" might improve clarity and professionalism.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "PDF datoteke" instead of "PDF-ove".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Перемкніться' is misspelled. The correct spelling is 'Перейдіть'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Перейдіть
